text: Mike Barry was the offensive line coach for the National Football League Detroit Lions. Barry played at Nebraska. Prior to coaching the Lions, Barry coached at the college football level for North Carolina State, University of Tennessee, University of Colorado, and the University of Southern California. Mike's son, Joe Barry, previously coached alongside him with the Detroit Lions. ==Coaching timeline== * 1980–1983 University of Arizona OL * 1984–1985 San Antonio Gunslingers OC * 1986 Iowa State University OL * 1987–1992 University of Colorado OC * 1993–1997 University of Southern California OL,OC * 1998–2002 University of Tennessee OL * 2003–2005 North Carolina State University OL * 2006–2008 Detroit Lions OL ==References== ==External links== * https://web.archive.org/web/20070927001312/http://www.detroitlions.com/bio.cfm?bio_id=359§ion;_id=15⊤=21&level;=2&season;=1 Category:Detroit Lions coaches Category:USC Trojans football coaches Category:Colorado Buffaloes football coaches Category:NC State Wolfpack football coaches Category:Tennessee Volunteers football coaches Category:Nebraska Cornhuskers football players Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Arizona Wildcats football coaches Category:Iowa State Cyclones football coaches
